definition: to break (sb's heart)/to cause grief to

sentences.english: His ingratitude cut me to the heart.
sentences.chinese: 他的忘恩負義傷透了我的心。

sentences.english: She was the falsest woman that ever broke man's heartstrings .
sentences.chinese: 她是所有曾經使男人傷透心的女人中最虛情假意的。

sentences.english: Your betrayal has broken Uther's heart, boy.
sentences.chinese: 你的倒戈傷透了烏瑟爾的心，小孩。

sentences.english: In to fill his stomach problem, is that Buha by a headache.
sentences.chinese: 在填飽肚子的問題上，更是令布哈依傷透了腦筋。

sentences.english: Her son's disgrace broke her heart.
sentences.chinese: 孩子做的壞事使她媽的心傷透了。

sentences.english: All love is lucky, even when it breaks your heart.
sentences.chinese: 所有的愛都是幸運的，縱然它傷透了你的心。

sentences.english: Prepareing for the Chirstmas Eve feast makes me at my wit's end.
sentences.chinese: 準備聖誕前夜宴會使我傷透腦筋。

sentences.english: Mother will she break my heart?
sentences.chinese: 媽媽，她會讓我傷透心嗎？

sentences.english: I beat my brains (out) to get a job.
sentences.chinese: 爲了找尋工作，我傷透了腦筋。

sentences.english: You know if you break my heart. I'll go.
sentences.chinese: 你知，假如，妳傷透了我的心我會走。

sentences.english: All love is lucky,even when it breaks your heart.
sentences.chinese: 所有的愛都是幸運的，即使它傷透了你的心。

sentences.english: 'It's breaking their hearts, ' went on the baker.
sentences.chinese: “這傷透了他們的心，”麪包師繼續說道。

sentences.english: She broke his heart , he spent his whole life tryin' to forget.
sentences.chinese: 她傷透了他的心，他將要用他的餘生去忘記。

sentences.english: My failure, and rejection, broke her.
sentences.chinese: 我的失敗和拒絕傷透了她的心。
